1.title: Crunching the Numbers: Attraction in Five Minutes
1.plot: Veronica is a no-nonsense accountant with no time to date. After learning Mehow's powerful attraction techniques, Will she be able to pass the test and attract her Mr. Right in 5 minutes? Or will she break under the pressure?

2.title: The Trek for Happily Ever After
2.plot: Angela is a secretly-nerdy Disney princess who can't seem to find the right guy. Will she use Mehow's techniques to make her dreams come true? Or will she end up kissing another frog?

3.title: Funny or Guy: Is Laughter the Best Medicine for Love?
3.plot: Kym is a stand-up comedienne who always gets dumped. Wills she attract her Mr. Right using the perfect opening line? Or will she end up as the punchline?

4.title: A Match for Marilyn
4.plot: Marilyn is a funny, free-spirited woman who tends to get stuck in the friend zone. Will Mehow's advice help calm her anxiety so she can attract her dream guy? Or will she freeze up and bore him?

5.title: The Hunger Games: Ruby's Story
5.plot: After taking a three-year hiatus from dating, Ruby is finally ready to get back into the game. Will she heed Mehow's advice and attract her perfect match? Or will she let her repressed desires get the best of her?

6.title: Beauty and the Box
6.plot: Kelly is a smart, beautiful biomedical engineering student who gets intimidated by extremely confident guys. Will Mehow's special training let Kelly take the lead? Or will she let her nervousness get the best of her?

7.title: Miss Picky Meets Mr. Right
7.plot: What do you get when you combine a sporty, family-oriented gal with high standards? You get Dre, a beautiful single woman looking for "The One." Will she use Mehow's dating tips and attract the man of her dreams?

8.title: Planting Seeds of Love
8.plot: A caring, nature-loving woman, Kathleen, has trouble weeding out the wrong men for her. Will she use Mehow's Magic phrase to make love bloom?

9.title: Animal Magnetism
9.plot: Amanda is a positive, animal-loving woman who tends to put her own needs on the back burner. Will she follow Mehow's directions and find a guy who also wants a relationship? Or will she end up kissing another frog?

10.title: Anxious Annie
10.plot: Annie has severe social anxiety that is starting to have an impact on her dating life. Will she be able to use Mehow's advice to overcome her anxiety and find her Mr.Right? Or will five minutes in the "box" be too much pressure for her to overcome?

11.title: The Introverts Guide to Love
11.plot: Monica is an artistic introvert who needs to learn how to be decisive in her dating life. Will she use Mehow's teachings to land a date with her dream guy? Or will it end in disaster?

12.title: Shawn Mowlai
12.plot:

imdb.plot outline: Armed with only her personality to seduce her young McDreamy and under the pressure of a ticking clock, can our "plain" Woman (still pretty, of course) use her infield training to get their match to actually say "yes" to a romantic date...and also mean it? Welcome Mr. Right.
imdb.title: Mr. Right
plot: Armed with only her personality to seduce her young McDreamy and under the pressure of a ticking clock, can our "plain" Woman (still pretty, of course) use her infield training to get their match to actually say "yes" to a romantic date...and also mean it? Welcome _Mr. Right_ (qv).

Mehow's groundbreaking how-to-get-the-guy series The Girls Game is BACK and rebranded for a new season with a buzz-worthy new layer that reveals the science of seduction with the thrill of an over-the-top pick-up challenge. Last season, we saw women complete Mehow's infield training. This season, the Game is raised as she completes the training, and is then given the ultimate test with the man of her dreams. That is... she's trapped in a white room with him - only she's been blindsided and plays this pick-up without getting done up. All she has are the clothes she came in, with no time to get dolled up. Armed with only her personality to seduce her young McDreamy and under the pressure of a ticking clock, can our "plain" Woman (still pretty, of course) use her infield training to get their match to actually say "yes" to a romantic date...and also mean it? Welcome _Mr. Right_ (qv).
